programme.title: Vendo que no h tempo a perder, Kakashi decide usar o Sharingan mais uma vez para derrotar Zabuza. Mas Zabuza um ninja experiente em batalhas mortais e, na primeira vez em que enfrentou o Sharingan, Zabuza conseguiu bolar uma estratgia.

programme.title: Naruto e Sasuke so atacados dentro dos Espelhos Cristal de Gelo de Haku. Durante a batalha, Sasuke percebe o poder do seu prprio Sharingan e comea a desviar dos ataques de Haku. Haku decide acabar com ele. Sasuke usa seu corpo para proteger Naruto...
programme.desc: Naruto: O Selo Quebrado

programme.title: Naruto finalmente explode! Sua raiva por Haku libera o poder da Raposa de Nove Caudas. O chakra de Naruto est to intenso que at Kakashi e Zabuza, que esto lutando distncia, percebem. Haku incapaz de fazer algo diante do poder secreto de Naruto.
programme.desc: Naruto: Passado Branco, Ambio Escondida

programme.title: Haku pede a Naruto que acabe com ele. Naruto questiona a filosofia de Haku sobre existir apenas para lutar e ganhar. Enquanto isso, a batalha entre Kakashi e Zabuza chega ao clmax. Com a vitria ao alcance, Kakashi libera sua manobra mais devastadora.
programme.desc: Naruto: As Armas Conhecidas Como Shinobi

programme.title: Pensando em Haku, Naruto confronta Zabuza com raiva. Sem demonstrar emoes, Zabuza se sente arrasado pela perda de Haku, a nica pessoa em quem confiava no mundo. Naruto aprende que esse tipo de realidade cruel , de fato, o destino de um ninja.
programme.desc: Naruto: O Demnio Na Neve

programme.title: Naruto e sua equipe voltam Aldeia Oculta da Folha depois da batalha do Pas das Ondas. Mesmo concluindo novas misses, Naruto est insatisfeito com a rotina diria, mas logo ele descobre que estrangeiros esto se juntando na Aldeia da Folha.
programme.desc: Naruto: A Prova Chunin

programme.title: Tubares de Gelo, (2016, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Uma nova raa de tubares vorazes e agressivos racha o fundo do oceano congelado de uma estao de pesquisa do rtico, devorando todos os que caem.

programme.title: Maldita Aranha Assassina, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: A cidade de Los Angeles tem um grande problema pela frente. Uma aranha gigante acaba de escapar de um laboratrio e est aterrorizando os moradores da cidade.

programme.title: Inferno na Montanha, (2021, Thriller)
programme.desc: Um pai e um filho tentam salvar os habitantes de uma pequena cidade de um desastre natural e do colapso de um tnel recm-construdo.

programme.title: Fuga do Vulco, (2014, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Quando um avio comercial fica preso dentro de um crculo de vulces em erupo, os passageiros e a tripulao precisam encontrar uma maneira de sobreviver - sem aterrissar.

programme.title: Infectados, (2010, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Aps perder contato com um grupo de pesquisadores em uma ilha remota, uma corporao militar contrata um grupo de cientistas para descobrir o que deu errado.

programme.title: Garota em Chamas: Rebelio, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Uma garota do ensino mdio descobre que seus talentos telecinticos so mais perigosos do que imaginava quando perseguida por criminosos. Agora ela ter que descobrir seu passado para controlar seus poderes e sobreviver.

programme.title: Terremoto, (2014, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Quando uma srie de terremotos comea a destruir Los Angeles, Emily e Jason correm pelas runas da cidade na esperana de desviar o epicentro para salvar milhes de vidas.

programme.title: A Tumba do Drago, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Travis Preston e sua equipe viajam para a China em busca de uma resposta para os misteriosos assassinatos que comeam a levantar suspeitas sobre a existncia de uma criatura lendria.

programme.title: Pnico em Seattle, (2012, Action)
programme.desc: Quando uma grande tempestade ameaa o noroeste do Pacfico, uma famlia deve se encontrar e trabalhar junta para acabar com a tempestade antes que ela se espalhe alm de seu controle e aniquile o planeta!

programme.title: Tormenta, (1996, Drama)
programme.desc: Em 1961, adolescentes viajam no "Albatroz", um navio-escola com um capito severo.O medo inicial se transforma em respeito, mas uma tragdia pode ameaar essa confiana.

programme.title: O Preo da Traio, (1996, Thriller)
programme.desc: Uma mulher chamada Allison Pond encontrada morta no deserto perto de Los Angeles.Um detetive investiga o caso e descobre que ela poderia estar ligada a um programa militar secreto.Porm, ele tambm guarda segredos: ela era sua amante.

programme.title: Caadores de Emoo, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: Johnny Utah, um jovem agente do FBI, se infiltra em crculos de surf para desmascarar uma gangue de ladres que, como marca registrada, usam mscaras de presidentes dos Estados Unidos durante seus golpes.

programme.title: O Legionrio, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: Na Marselha dos anos 20, lutador de boxe vence luta que deveria perder de propsito. Para fugir dos gngsters que buscam vingana, resolve se alistar na Legio Estrangeira, onde enfrenta os horrores da batalha no inspito deserto do Marrocos.

programme.title: Corao de Drago, (1985, Action)
programme.desc: Um policial (Jackie Chan) tem a difcil tarefa de cuidar do seu irmo deficiente mental, Sammo. Quando Sammo, acidentalmente se envolve num roubo, ele sequestrado por bandidos e Jackie, tem que salv-lo.

programme.title: Outubro Negro, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: Jornalista americano viaja para Israel com o intuito de investigar a morte de oito fuzileiros navais, vtimas de um ataque terrorista. Mas ele acaba descobrindo que muito mais coisas se escondem por trs do incidente e sua vida passa a correr perigo.

programme.title: A Fria do Protetor, (1985, Action)
programme.desc: Billy Wong, policial de Nova Iorque que usa artes marciais, investiga com seu parceiro o sequestro de Laura, filha de um milionrio suspeito de ligao com um traficante de Hong Kong.

programme.title: Uma Histria Americana, (1991, Drama)
programme.desc: Duas mulheres, uma negra e uma branca, em 1955 Montgomery Alabama, devem decidir o que faro em resposta ao famoso boicote aos nibus liderado por Martin Luther King.

programme.title: Drages para Sempre, (1988, Action)
programme.desc: Jackie contratado para defender uma empresa acusada de poluir as guas da cidade. Ao descobrir que eles produzem drogas, Jackie decide mudar de lado.

programme.title: Grandes Olhos, (2015, Drama)
programme.desc: Pintora e defensora das causas feministas, a norte-americana Margaret Keane enfrenta um de seus maiores desafios ao levar ao tribunal o prprio marido. Em um perodo em que o reconhecimento de um trabalho feminino era difcil.

programme.title: Abrao, (1993, Faith & Spirituality)
programme.desc: Deus decide fazer uma nova promessa humanidade depois das calamidades que culminaram no desastre da Torre de Babel. Abrao escolhido para torna-se o Pai das Naes e a histria da redeno se inicia.

programme.title: O Milagre, (2015, Drama)
programme.desc: Um novo professor enviado para trabalhar numa pequena vila que sequer possui uma escola. L, ele logo faz amizade com um simptico homem deficiente. O professor rene os moradores para construir uma escola ali para ensinar as crianas e seu novo amigo.

programme.title: O Que Fazer?, (2014, Drama)
programme.desc: Depois de saber que s tem 90 minutos de vida, por conta de um aneurisma no crebro, um homem infeliz quer fazer as pazes com todos aqueles que foram magoados por ele.

programme.title: O Fsico, (2014, Drama)
programme.desc: No sculo XI, um rfo carente viaja para a Prsia para estudar medicina com um renomado curandeiro.

programme.title: Lute Por Sua Vida, (2014, Drama)
programme.desc: Um filme focado em um grupo de pessoas obcecadas por um livro de autoajuda. medida que o livro se torna mais popular, ele afeta uma estranha variedade de personagens. Suas vidas se cruzam, gerando mudanas que duraro para sempre.

programme.title: Em Busca de um Milagre, (2018, Drama)
programme.desc: O mundo do doutor Luke Matthew desaba quando ele perde o amor de sua vida e se torna pai na mesma noite. Quando ele contrata Sage como a nova bab, os dois comeam a perceber que a melhor forma de remdio deixar ir.

programme.title: Davi e Golias, (2020, Action)

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Momento De Despertar
programme.desc: O dia para capturar o espio finalmente chega. Yamato assume a aparncia de Sasori e espera que o espio aparea. Para a surpresa de todos, o espio era Kabuto. De repente, Orochimaru aparece. A situao muda, e a equipe Kakashi se encontra em risco.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Desespero
programme.desc: Ao enfrentar Orochimaru, Naruto liberta o poder da Raposa de Nove Caudas. Quando Yamato v a quarta cauda, lembra do que Jiraiya falou. Yamato deveria suprimir o chakra que afetaria o corpo de Naruto. O ninjutsu secreto de Yamato se torna aparente.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Ressonncia
programme.desc: Quando a terceira cauda aparece, Naruto s consegue ver Orochimaru. Ele est cego at para seus companheiros de equipe. Sakura atingida e cai inconsciente. Sai finalmente segue para sua misso secreta. Naruto libera a quarta cauda proibida.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Meu Amigo
programme.desc: Naruto perde a conscincia e tomado por impulsos destrutivos. Os clones de Sai e Yamato testemunham uma batalha horrvel entre Orochimaru e Naruto. O poder e a aparncia de Naruto se tornam demonacos, como se ele estivesse se transformando na Raposa.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Uma Ameaa Se Aproxima
programme.desc: Naruto, mesmo transformado, no desiste de trazer Sasuke para casa. Sakura ferida por Naruto, mas consegue usar seu ninjutsu para conter a agitao da Raposa de Nove Caudas. Orochimaru tenta deixar o campo de batalha, mas confrontado por Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Invaso Da Akatsuki
programme.desc: Orochimaru aceita levar Sai para o esconderijo. Yamato consegue parar a agitao de Naruto, mas os ferimentos de Naruto so graves. Quando ele volta a si, Yamato revela a ele e Sakura que Sai foi embora e que Danzo pode estar conspirando algo terrvel.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Sob O Cu Estrelado
programme.desc: Naruto e sakura ficam chocados quando descobrem que Danzo planeja trabalhar com Orochimaru. A equipe Dakashi forada a fazer uma pausa. Orochimaru percebe que est sendo seguido pelo clone de Yamato e decide usar Sai para despistar seus perseguidores.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Orao Do Velho Monge
programme.desc: Naruto fica chocado ao saber que foi o responsvel pelos ferimentos de Sakura. Yamato diz que ele ir suprimir o poder da Raposa de Nove Caudas com seu ninjutsu. Sakura pergunta sobre uma histria estranha que ela viu no livro de desenhos de Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Prximo Passo
programme.desc: Sai estremece quando encontra Sasuke no esconderijo de Orochimaru. Sai ficar com Orochimaru em troca de algumas informaes valiosas, mas ficar sob priso domiciliar at que possa ser de confiana. Quando fica sozinho, sai e comea a procurar um livro.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Escalada De Prata
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi consegue achar Sai. Eles comeam a interrog-lo sobre os planos de Danzo, e Sai conta tudo. Sakura descobre, atravs das atitudes de Sai, alguns pontos fortes em seu subconsciente e assinala para Sai as contradies em seu comportamento.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Julgamento
programme.desc: Kabuto faz um ataque de surpresa na equipe Kakashi para levar Sai de volta. Com as informaes que conseguem atravs de Kabuto, capturado, a procura por Sasuke est perto do fim. Naruto e Sakura correm para achar Sasuke.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Un Grito Interrompido
programme.desc: Naruto procura por Sasuke. Sai lembra que teve um irmo mais velho e consegue terminar o retrato inacabado. Antes de desaparecer aps um ataque de Orochimaru, Sai promete que salvar Sasuke. Yamato descobre uma verdade entre os pertences de Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: ltimas Palavras
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi fica chocada ao saber que a misso verdadeira de Sai matar Sasuke. Sai alcana Sasuke - deve mat-lo ou salv-lo? Sai e Sasuke se enfrentam, demolindo uma parte do esconderijo. Naruto e os outros encontram Sasuke.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Notcias Tristes
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi tem seu desejo atendido ao reencontrar Sasuke, mas Sasuke no mudou. Seu objetivo se vingar de seu irmo mais velho, Itachi. Os impulsos da Raposa de Nove Caudas incitam Naruto, mas Sasuke usa seu sharingan para suprimir a raposa.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Equipe Dez
programme.desc: O desejo de Sasuke por vingana continua firme. Naruto fica chateado quando percebe que fracassou mais uma vez em levar Sasuke para casa. Orochimaru tem mais ou menos seis meses at sua transferncia. A equipe Kakashi faz uma nova promessa.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Sun
programme.desc: Jotaro and his fellows take camels and travel across the desert, headed for Cairo. Along the way, though, they can't shake the sensation that someone or something is watching their every move.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Death 13, Part 1
programme.desc: Kakyoin dreams about being in a strange amusement park, where he encounters the Death tarot card. While in the dream he witnesses Death cut down a dog, but after waking up in terror he can't remember what the nightmare was about.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Death 13, Part 2
programme.desc: Kakyoin tries to convince the others that the baby is a Stand user, but they merely start to doubt his sanity. Unable to persuade his friends, Kakyoin resorts to some extreme measures.

programme.title: Dark Tide, (2012, Action)
programme.desc:
Kate accepts a lucrative opportunity to lead a thrill-seeking millionaire businessman on a shark dive in the most dangerous waters, outside the cage.

programme.desc: When Malcolm takes the plunge and lets his girlfriend Keisha move into his house, he senses they're not alone. Videotaping a series of paranormal events, Malcolm is shocked to discover the love of his life is demonically possessed by an evil spirit.

programme.title: Baby Assassins 2, (2023, Foreign Action & Adventure)
programme.desc: After the agency suspends its top assassins, aspiring hitmen decide to eliminate themleading to a lightning-fast showdown between trained killers.

programme.desc: When an affluent couple lose all their money following a series of blunders, they turn to a life of crime to make ends meet.

programme.desc: Enter the world of 1970s TV news, where Ron Burgundy and his loyal Channel 4 News Team are San Diego's #1 rated news source. All is well in their male-dominated world of news until rising star reporter Veronica Corningstone turns it upside down.

programme.title: Anchorman 2: The Legend Continues, (2013, Comedy)
programme.desc: The wait is over, America -- Ron Burgundy is back! After losing his job, Ron reassembles the news team and squares off against a new rival in the comedy that critics are calling one of the funniest movies of the year!

programme.title: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days, (2003, Romance)

programme.title: Just Like Heaven, (2005, Romance)
programme.desc: He's convinced she's a spirit. She's convinced she's still alive. As they search for the truth of Elizabeth's past, their relationship changes from resentment to romance.

programme.title: It Had to Be You, (2000, Romance)
programme.desc: Two strangers meet and fall in love during the weekend that they are planning their respective weddings.

programme.title: A Little Bit of Heaven, (2011, Romance)
programme.desc: A young woman (Kate Hudson) who uses her humor to avoid intimacy has a life-changing visit from her doctor in this divinely funny dramatic comedy. With Whoopi Goldberg and Peter Dinklage.

programme.title: Two Night Stand, (2014, Romance)
programme.desc: A snowstorm forces two people who made an online connection to unwillingly extend their one-night stand.

programme.title: Life Partners, (2014, Comedy)
programme.desc: At 29, the most long-term relationship Sasha (Leighton Meester) and Paige (Gillian Jacobs) have ever been in is with each other, using their co-dependent friendship as an excuse not to venture out into the dating world alone.

programme.title: The Last Kiss, (2006, Drama)
programme.desc: The Last Kiss is a contemporary comedy-drama about life, love, infidelity, forgiveness, marriage, friendship and coming to grips with turning 30.

programme.title: Just Like Heaven, (2005, Romance)
programme.desc: He's convinced she's a spirit. She's convinced she's still alive. As they search for the truth of Elizabeth's past, their relationship changes from resentment to romance.

programme.title: The Gift, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: Widow and mother of three, Annie Wilson makes her living by foretelling others' futures...though her own has become cloudier than even she can see.

programme.title: Thunderheart, (1992, Thriller)
programme.desc: Val Kilmer, Sam Shepard and Graham Greene star in this murder mystery filled with style and suspense. Kilmer stars as Ray Levoi, a hotshot FBI agent who's thrust into a strange new world when he is sent to solve a murder on an Indian reservation.

programme.title: Haywire, (2012, Action)
programme.desc: A highly trained operative, is double crossed & left for dead by someone in her own agency. When things go haywire, she finds ways to turn the tables on her ruthless adversary.

programme.title: Unforgettable, (1996, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A forensics expert is thrust into a heart-stopping adventure when he takes an experimental memory drug in the hopes of discovering his wife's murderer.

programme.title: The General's Daughter, (1998, Thriller)
programme.desc: There's the right way, the wrong way and the Army way. But there's no way military investigator Paul Brenner is going to participate in a cover-up when Fort MacCallum officials try to hide the motive behind the murder of a female officer.

programme.title: The Saint, (1997, Thriller)
programme.desc: Want someone to infiltrate a top-secret organization or steal a scientific formula that could change the world? For the right price, The Saint is your man.

programme.title: The Gift, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: Widow and mother of three, Annie Wilson makes her living by foretelling others' futures...though her own has become cloudier than even she can see.

programme.desc: In WWII, a group of German officers plot to assassinate Hitler and seize control of the military command to end the war. The operation was code-named "Valkyrie", for the plan that was meant to be used in case of a revolt against the Nazi government.

programme.desc: When Intelligence Officer Max Vatan (Brad Pitt) learns his wife (Academy Award winner Marion Cotillard) may be conspiring with the enemy, he has only 72 hours to prove her innocence and save his family before he must do the unthinkable.

programme.title: Selma, (2014, Drama)
programme.desc: From the Oscar-winning producers of 12 Years a Slave comes a powerful true story starring David Oyelewo and Oprah Winfrey. Facing violent opposition, Martin Luther King, Jr., led a historic march from Selma to Montgomery, changing the world forever.

programme.title: The Kite Runner, (2007, Drama)
programme.desc: Amir is a young Afghani from a well-to-do Kabul family; his best friend Hassan is the son of a family servant. Together the two boys form a bond of friendship that breaks tragically on one fateful day.

programme.title: The Master, (2012, Drama)
programme.desc: Haunted by his past, WW-II veteran and drifter Freddie Quell (Joaquin Phoenix) crosses paths with a mysterious movement led by The Master (Phillip Seymour Hoffman) and his wife (Amy Adams).

programme.title: Capote, (2005, Drama)
programme.desc: In 1959, Truman Capote learns about the horrific and senseless murder of a family of four in Kansas. As he digs deeper into the story, he is inspired to expand the project into what would be his greatest work, In Cold Blood.

programme.title: The Kite Runner, (2007, Drama)
programme.desc: Amir is a young Afghani from a well-to-do Kabul family; his best friend Hassan is the son of a family servant. Together the two boys form a bond of friendship that breaks tragically on one fateful day.

programme.title: Rain Man, (1988, Drama)

programme.title: Dragonslayer, (1981, Science fiction)
programme.desc: The young wizarding apprentice Galen, is sent to kill a dragon which has been devouring girls from a nearby kingdom. Will his magic be enough to save him?

programme.title: Raging Bull, (2020, Drama)

programme.title: Bill & Ted's Bogus Journey, (1991, Comedy)

programme.title: Orochimaru and Kabuto suddenly appear before Tsunade and Shizune who are out sightseeing.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: In exchange for healing his arms, Orochimaru offers to bring back to life Tsunade's younger brother Nawaki and Dan, her sweetheart.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto is incensed at the way Tsunade disrespects the position of Hokage and challenges her to a fight.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto practices hard so he can win the necklace from Tsunade. Meanwhile, Tsunade is in a dilemma over Orochimarus offer.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Gripped by the desire to see Nawaki and Dan, Tsunade almost succumbs to Orochimarus tempting offer.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Orochimaru and Kabuto use a summoning jutsu to call forth a giant snake. Still drugged and unable to fully use his chakra, Jiraiya summons little Gamakichi.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Narutos ninja way is to never go back on his word. Naruto is seriously injured by Kabuto and hovers on the verge of death.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Jiraiya, Tsunade and Orochimaru all release their summoning jutsu. And a fierce battle begins.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Tsunade, Naruto, and the others start heading back to the Leaf Village where Tsunade will formally become the Fifth Hokage. At Tsunade's urging, they stop at a town with hot springs.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto asks Tsunade to heal Sasuke and Lee before she is installed as the Hokage. After examining Lee, she tells him to find a path other than that of a shinobi.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Lee hesitates when Tsunade asks him whether he will quit pursuing the path of a ninja or choose to undergo a risky surgery with only a fifty percent chance of success.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: After being advised by Tsunade to quit the path of the shinobi, Lee recalls his first meeting with his teacher Guy.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto and his two squadmates have always wanted to see what Kakashi looks like under his mask. The three do whatever they can to reveal his whole face.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto, Sasuke, and Sakura are to protect the runners in a race being held during the Todoroki Shrine's ceremonial ritual held every four years.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The chief retainers think that Idate has made a farce of their great traditional festival. Jirocho believes that Idate has fled with some plan in mind.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto and his squad manage to catch up to Idate, only to find him hurt and unconscious with Aoi nearby.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Despite interference from Aoi, Idate continues his run. Idate still trusts no one, and its revealed that during the Chunin Exams, Idates older brother was the proctor who posed the tenth question.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Boss Jirocho waits, confident that Idate will win. But Aoi, the ninja sent by the Wagarashi clan, stands in the way.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Shikamaru is promoted to chunin, and he and his squadmates celebrate at a BBQ restaurant. In the hospital, Lee decides to undergo a dangerous surgery to repair his body so that he can remain a ninja.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto and Sasuke release their ultimate weapons against each other, and just in time, Kakashi arrives to stop the fight.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The Sound Ninja Four, Kidomaru, Sakon, Jirobo and Tayuya, suddenly appear before Sasuke. Sakura is concerned about the Curse Mark placed on Sasuke by Orochimaru
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Sakuras pleas fall on deaf ears, and Sasuke leaves Hidden Leaf Village. When Tsunade learns of this, she summons Shikamaru to lead his first mission as a chunin.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The Sound Ninja Four race toward Orochimarus lair with Sasuke in hand. Theyre discovered and challenged by the jonin Genma and Raido
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: King of New York, (1990, Thriller)
programme.desc: Recently freed from prison, Frank White (Christopher Walken) begins to exterminate the drug lords who rose to power in his absence. When a group of enraged cops declares war on him, Frank's answer is to put a contract out on the cops.

programme.title: A Simple Plan, (1998, Drama)
programme.desc: In a gym bag. That's how three men size up what they've found in the snowy Minnesota woods. They've come across a downed plane with a rotting corpse inside...and over $4 million stuffed inside a duffel bag. Finders, keepers? Maybe.

programme.title: Catch Me If You Can, (2002, Comedy)
programme.desc: From three-time Oscar-winning director Steven Spielberg, Catch Me If You Can follows Frank W. Abagnale, Jr. as he successfully passes himself off as a pilot, a lawyer, and a doctor - all before his 21st birthday!

programme.title: Life of Crime, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: A pampered housewife (Jennifer Aniston) is kidnapped by a pair of blundering ex-cons in an effort to extort money from her sleazy real-estate tycoon husband (Tim Robbins).

programme.title: Lucky Number Slevin, (2006, Thriller)
programme.desc: A case of mistaken identity lands Slevin into the middle of a war being plotted by two of the city's most rival crime bosses: The Rabbi and The Boss.

programme.title: Find Me Guilty, (2006, Drama)
programme.desc: In the late 1980s, a low level gangster named Jackie DiNorscio defends himself in court in what became the longest criminal trial in American judicial history.

programme.title: Best Men, (1999, Comedy)
programme.desc: Drew Barrymore, Luke Wilson and Sean Patrick Flannery star in this hilarious action-comedy wherein Drew Barrymore is a young woman determined to have the perfect wedding day, despite the fact that the groomsmen have decided to rob the local bank.

programme.title: State of Grace, (1990, Drama)
programme.desc: In this neo-noir crime film, an undercover cop (Sean Penn) comes back to his old neighborhood in New York City's Hell's Kitchen to bring down the Irish Mafia, which is now led by two of his childhood friends (Gary Oldman and Ed Harris).

programme.title: Chef, (2014, Comedy)
programme.desc: A troubled chef looks to reignite his passion for cooking by launching a food truck in this spicy film.

programme.title: Shakespeare in Love, (1998, Drama)
programme.desc: After providing inspiration to Will Shakespeare, his case of writer's block cured, and a taste for romance rekindled by the mysterious Lady Viola. Gwyneth Paltrow, Joseph Fiennes, Ben Affleck, and Dame Judi Dench star in this Best Picture winner.

programme.title: Titanic, (1997, Drama)
programme.desc: Leonardo DiCaprio and Oscar-nominee Kate Winslet light up the screen as Jack and Rose, the young lovers who find one another on the maiden voyage of the "unsinkable" R.M.S. Titanic.

programme.title: A Walk to Remember, (2002, Drama)
programme.desc: Two North Carolina teens, Landon Carter and Jamie Sullivan, are thrown together after Landon gets into trouble and is sentenced to perform community service.

programme.title: Shakespeare in Love, (1998, Drama)
programme.desc: After providing inspiration to Will Shakespeare, his case of writer's block cured, and a taste for romance rekindled by the mysterious Lady Viola. Gwyneth Paltrow, Joseph Fiennes, Ben Affleck, and Dame Judi Dench star in this Best Picture winner.

programme.title: Titanic, (1997, Drama)
programme.desc: Leonardo DiCaprio and Oscar-nominee Kate Winslet light up the screen as Jack and Rose, the young lovers who find one another on the maiden voyage of the "unsinkable" R.M.S. Titanic.

programme.title: A Walk to Remember, (2002, Drama)
programme.desc: Two North Carolina teens, Landon Carter and Jamie Sullivan, are thrown together after Landon gets into trouble and is sentenced to perform community service.

programme.title: The Truman Show, (1998, Drama)
programme.desc: Truman doesnt realize that his quaint hometown is a giant studio set run by a visionary producer/director/creator (Ed Harris), that folks living and working there are Hollywood actors, that even his incessantly bubbly wife is a contract player.

programme.title: Total Recall, (1990, Science fiction)
programme.desc: It's 2084 A.D. and Doug Quaid is haunted by recurring dreams about journeying to Earths closest planetary neighbor, Mars.

programme.title: Fire In The Sky, (1993, Science fiction)
programme.desc: In 1975, logger Travis Walton (D.B. Sweeney) and his co-workers discovered a hovering UFO. Walton's pals fled, but Walton was not so fortunate. Whisked aboard the strange craft, he was subjected to a painful, unearthly medical study.

programme.title: Species, (1995, Science fiction)
programme.desc: She's beautiful, seductive, intelligent, and her charms could spell doom for the entire human race! Ben Kingsley, Forrest Whitaker, and Natasha Henstridge star in this adrenaline-charged sci-fi hit.

programme.title: The Lawnmower Man (Director's Cut), (1992, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Dr. Lawrence Angelo (Pierce Brosnan) is a brilliant scientist obsessed with perfecting virtual reality software. When his experiments on animals fail, he finds the ideal substitute Jobe Smith (Jeff Fahey), a slow-witted gardener.

programme.title: Total Recall, (1990, Science fiction)
programme.desc: It's 2084 A.D. and Doug Quaid is haunted by recurring dreams about journeying to Earths closest planetary neighbor, Mars.

programme.title: Fire In The Sky, (1993, Science fiction)
programme.desc: In 1975, logger Travis Walton (D.B. Sweeney) and his co-workers discovered a hovering UFO. Walton's pals fled, but Walton was not so fortunate. Whisked aboard the strange craft, he was subjected to a painful, unearthly medical study.

programme.title: Cube, (1997, Thriller)
programme.desc: Seven complete strangers of widely varying personality characteristics are involuntarily placed in an endless maze containing deadly traps.

programme.title: The Taking of Pelham One Two Three, (1974, Thriller)
programme.desc: A gang hijacks a subway train and threaten to kill the hostages one by one until their demands are met. Forced to stall, transit chief Lt. Garber (Walter Matthau) must outmaneuver one of the craftiest and cruelest screen villains (Robert Shaw) ever.

programme.title: Save The Tiger, (1973, Drama)
programme.desc: Jack Lemmon plays Harry Stoner, a man caught in violent collision with his past and present life. He believes there is nothing significant in his life except survival, and that instinct pushes him beyond moral conduct.

programme.title: Thunderbolt and Lightfoot, (1974, Action)
programme.desc: Clint Eastwood and Jeff Bridges lead a strong supporting cast in this offbeat crime caper about a colorful group of bank robbers determined to break into the fortress-like Montana Armored Depository.

programme.title: Rancho Deluxe, (1975, Western)
programme.desc: Jack (Jeff Bridges) and Cecil (Sam Waterston) are an oddball team of modern-day Montana cattle rustlers, and theyve set their sights on a pair of unlikely ranch owners from New York (Clifton James, Elizabeth Ashley). But can they outfox the foxes?

programme.title: Foxy Brown, (1974, Action)
programme.desc: A blaxploitation film about a woman whose drug-dealing brother ratted on her undercover narcotics-agent boyfriend to the mob and she, in turn, poses as a call girl to infiltrate the mobsters who butchered him.

programme.title: Friday Foster, (1975, Blaxploitation)
programme.desc: No sooner has photojournalist Friday Foster (Pam Grier) been warned that her personal involvement in stories will not end happily, than she witnesses the attempted assassination of a prominent African-American figure. Now Friday is a target!

programme.title: Frogs, (1972, Horror)
programme.desc: A revenge-of-nature-type film in which thousands of swamp critters attack a wheelchair-bound, Deep South plantation owner and his family on his birthday...the 4th of July...probably because he's been destroying the bayou wildlife.

programme.title: From Noon Till Three, (1976, Action)
programme.desc: Charles Bronson plays Graham Dorsey, a bank robber who, through a series of twists and turns finds himself the object of national adoration. A beautiful widow, Amanda Starbuck (Jill Ireland) is responsible for creating this myth.

programme.title: Futureworld, (1976, Science fiction)
programme.desc: An amusement park of the future caters to any adult fantasy. Lifelike androids carry out your every whim. A fun place, right? Not so, as a reporter and his Girl Friday find out while on a press junket to the newly opened Futureworld...

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! VRAINS
programme.desc: The Shepherd's out to eliminate the leader of the Ignis - Lightning!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! VRAINS
programme.desc: The Shepherd has the upper hand in his duel with Lightning, but Lightning's ready to strike!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! VRAINS
programme.desc: Playmaker and Ai detect a mysterious message from... the Earth Ignis? How is this possible when Earth was defeated and deleted by Gore?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! VRAINS
programme.desc: Gore's ready to risk everything to take down Playmaker including short-circuiting his brain!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Go With the Flow, Part 1
programme.desc: Its sink or swim for Yuma when he puts his deck on the line and challenges Shark, the school bully, to a duel. Can Yuma beat the schools #1 duelist, or will Yumas life points get reeled in by this ruthless opponent?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Go With the Flow, Part 2
programme.desc: Its a dueling disaster for Yuma when a mysterious visitor from another galaxy suddenly appears, putting his duel with Shark in serious jeopardy!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: In the End, Part 1
programme.desc: When the city is thrust into chaos after several of its computers become infected by a malicious virus, Yuma and Tori set out to find the culprit.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: In the End, Part 2
programme.desc: Yuma must outduel his math teacher before his life points are subtracted and the virus planted in the citys computer system goes viral.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Flipping Out, Part 1
programme.desc: When fellow classmate Flip offers Yuma an Xyz Monster, Tori and Bronk warn Yuma to stay clear of this two-faced trouble maker.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Flipping Out, Part 2
programme.desc: Yuma must figure out a way to defeat Flip or risk losing his Utopia card and Astral forever!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: The Sparrow, Part 1
programme.desc: When Nelson Andrews, star of the hit TV series The Sparrow, becomes possessed by a Number Card, Yuma challenges him to a duel, putting Astrals safety on the line.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: The Sparrow, Part 2
programme.desc: Yuma must figure out a way to defeat The Sparrow and his powerful Galaxy Queen before Nelson and Astral disappear forever!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Feline Frenzy
programme.desc: In order to find his missing friend Tori, Yuma must face off against a feline fanatic who has the purr-fect answers to his every move.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Shark Attack
programme.desc: Yuma discovers that Shark has started running with the wrong crowd and given up dueling. Can Yuma hook Shark back into battling, or are Shark's dueling days done forever?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: The Pack, Part 1
programme.desc: When Yuma learns that Shark is going to be set up to take the fall for stealing a priceless deck, Yuma challenges Sharks thug friends to a duel.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: The Pack, Part 2
programme.desc: Yuma and Sharks tag team battle against The Pack reaches a fevery pitch, for if Yuma loses, he also loses Utopia!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: The Number Hunter, Part 1
programme.desc: Yuma and Astral face their toughest battle ever when they are forced to duel a mysterious individual who hunts Number Cards.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: The Number Hunter, Part 2
programme.desc: As the back-and-forth battle between Yuma and the mysterious Number Hunter continues, Yuma must duel like hes never dueled before if he wants to save Astral, his Number Cards and his soul!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Training Days, Part 1
programme.desc: The legendary Dark Magician and Blue-Eyes White Dragon come out of retirement when a wise old man named Master Roku challenges Yuma to a duel.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Training Days, Part 2
programme.desc: After challenging Master Rokus former student to a duel, Yuma relies on his masters teachings in order to defeat the evil Kaze and save the Duel Sanctuarys Legendary Deck!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Its in the Cards, Part 1
programme.desc: When a mysterious fortune teller agrees to help out Yumas friends, they soon find themselves in a terrifying situation. Can Yuma rescue his pals, or will the all-knowing Fortuno see to it that Yuma fails?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Its in the Cards, Part 2
programme.desc: Yuma must figure out a way to defeat the mysterious and all-knowing Fortuno if he wants to save his friends, his Number Card and his soul!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: The Edge of the World
programme.desc: While on the way to School Spirit Day, Yuma realizes the Golden Key his father gave him is missing. As Astral and Yuma retrace his steps, Yuma shares the exciting story behind the Golden Keys origins.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Roots of the Problem
programme.desc: When Yuma gets into a fight with Bronk, their friendship is soon put to the ultimate test when an evil Number Card takes control of Yuma.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Battle With the Bot
programme.desc: Yuma befriends a broken Litterbot only to discover that it has been programmed to do the dirty work for a wanted jewel thief. Can Yuma put a stop to this thiefs thieving ways, or will Yumas newest friend trash his plan to stop him?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: The Shark Hunter
programme.desc: Shark tries to stop Kite from stealing Yumas Golden Key by challenging him to a duel. Can Shark sink his teeth into Kites life points and save Yumas prized possession, or will Kites cunning skills sink any chance Shark has of winning?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Hunting Down the Hunter, Part 1
programme.desc: With his Golden Key in Kites possession, Yuma must hunt down the Number Hunter if he ever wants to see Astral again.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Hunting Down the Hunter, Part 2
programme.desc: While Yuma continues to search for Astral and the Golden Key, while Astral looks for a way to defeat Kite and save all his Number Cards.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Frozen in Time
programme.desc: When an unexpected phenomenon stops time, Kite is able to gain the upper hand by tapping into Astral's memories and witnessing firsthand the battles that he and Yuma have fought together.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Let the Duels Begin
programme.desc: With the World Duel Carnival about to begin, Yuma gets set to take on the best duelists from around the world that is, until he realizes he never entered. Can Yuma figure out a way to join the Carnival, or will Yumas efforts fall short?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: A Team Performance
programme.desc: The World Duel Carnival kicks off when Yuma is challenged by Striker, a soccer player turned duelist who has one goal in mind: victory.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Heavy Metal
programme.desc: Yuma rises up to the challenge of a pint-sized duelist and his deck of monster machines.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Love Hurts
programme.desc: Yuma broke Annas heart years ago, and now shes back for revenge. If Yuma loses, he has to be Annas boyfriend forever.

programme.title: Nami gives love advice to a zombie, Luffy finds himself face-to-face with Gecko Moria, and Robin gets caught in spooky spider web. Things look bleak for the Straw Hats until their skeleton friend lends a hand!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: APPEARING FROM THE SKY! THAT MAN IS THE HUMMING SWORDSMAN!

programme.title: Brook strikes the final blow in his battle with the spider monkey, Gecko Moria's devious plan is revealed, and Luffy's escape attempt leads to the loss of something he can't live without!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LUFFY'S EMERGENCY SITUATION! THE ULTIMATE SHADOW'S DESTINATION!

programme.title: Brook tells Franky and Robin the secret to slaying zombies, and Gecko Moria reveals the terrifying monster that will be the recipient of Luffy's shadow!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE WARRIOR KNOWN AS THE "DEVIL"!! THE MOMENT OF OARS' REVIVAL

programme.title: Luffy's shadow is forced into the body of a monster, Usopp and Chopper get incinerated, and Nami is kidnapped by a zombie who wants to make her his wife!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: AWAKENING AFTER 500 YEARS!! OARS OPENS HIS EYES!!

programme.title: Gecko Moria's minions struggle with the burden of feeding a giant zombie brought to life by Luffy's shadow. Meanwhile, Brook flashes back to a battle that almost cost him his beloved afro!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A BELIEF WORTH BEGGING TO LIVE FOR!! BROOK DEFENDS HIS AFRO

programme.title: The freshly-revived trio of Luffy, Zoro, and Sanji discover that their shadows are missing, and Franky relates Brook's story about a promise he made to a very special whale!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A MAN'S PROMISE NEVER DIES!! TO THE FRIEND WAITING UNDER THE DISTANT SKY

programme.title: Luffy and the Straw Hats flash back to the heartbreaking story of Laboon the abandoned whale, and Brook's battle with the zombie samurai reveals the reason behind his intense afro love!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I SWEAR TO GO SEE HIM!! BROOK AND THE CAPE OF PROMISE

programme.title: Luffy sets out to regain his shadow and convince Brook to join the crew. Meanwhile, Sanji races to stop Nami's zombie wedding before it's too late!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: FOOD, NAMI AND SHADOWS!! LUFFY'S ENRAGED COUNTERATTACK

programme.title: Usopp's naturally negative personality makes him the only Straw Hat who stands a chance against Perona's depressing army of ghosts, and Chopper prepares to do battle against his hero, Dr. Hogback!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: USOPP'S THE STRONGEST? LEAVE ANYTHING NEGATIVE TO HIM

programme.title: When Brook is overmatched by the zombie samurai, Zoro steps in to help the skeleton get his shadow back. Meanwhile, Luffy prepares for a battle with Gecko Moria, and Sanji interrupts an undead wedding!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE GENERAL ZOMBIES ARE DOWN IN A FLASH!! OARS FEELS LIKE AN ADVENTURE!!

programme.title: Despite his furious attempts, Luffy struggles to land a blow against Gecko Moria, but Sanji fares much better in his passionate attempt to defeat Nami's beastly abductor!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: BLAZING KNIGHT SANJI!! KICK DOWN THE FAKE WEDDING

programme.title: Sanji takes a beating when his opponent suddenly turns invisible, Luffy finally manages to land a blow in his battle with Gecko Moria, and Usopp uses fire to ward off a zombie bear!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A CLEAR-CLEAR HISTORY? SANJI'S STOLEN DREAM

programme.title: After getting the stuffing beat out of him by a zombie teddy bear, Usopp summons his sharp-shooting alter ego to help him discover the secret to defeating Perona!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: SAVE ME, HERO!! MY ENEMY IS THE IMMORTAL PRINCESS

programme.title: Usopp reaches deep into his devious bag of tricks to even the odds in his battle with Perona. Meanwhile, Luffy can't lay a finger on Gecko Moria, and a zombie is less than gentlemanly in his battle with Robin!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: PERONA IS TERRIFIED!! USOPP AND UNTRUTHFUL SHARE THE SAME "U"

programme.title: While Franky and Brook watch in awe, Zorro and the zombie samurai wage a sword-slinging battle the likes of which the world has never seen before!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: SLASHES DANCING ON THE ROOFTOP!! SHOWDOWN: ZORO VS. RYUMA

programme.title: Chopper can no longer contain his fury over Dr. Hogback's evil treatment of his zombie slaves. Meanwhile, Luffy prepares to face the zombie who's wearing his shadow!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: CHOPPER IS FURIOUS!! HOGBACK'S EVIL MEDICAL PRACTICES

programme.title: Moria's mansion is reduced to ruins as the zombie with Luffy's shadow stalks the Straw Hats! As the walls come tumbling down, Chopper puts the hurt on Hogback, and Nami vanishes right before Sanji's eyes!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: OARS ROARS! COME OUT, STRAW HAT CREW

programme.title: One by one, the Straw Hats attack Oars, but the monstrous zombie appears too powerful to be defeated. Luffy's got his sights set on Moria, but he'd better hurry if he wants to save his crew!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LUFFY IS THE ENEMY! THE ULTIMATE ZOMBIE VS. THE STRAW HAT CREW

programme.title: Nami wakes up just in time to find out she's about to marry a zombie, but the special occasion is interrupted by very jealous warthog!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: YOU'RE GOING DOWN, ABSALOM!! NAMI'S LIGHTNING ATTACK OF FRIENDSHIP!!

programme.title: Nami attempts to track down some missing treasure, Brook searches the kitchen for a mystery ingredient, and a heroic team effort topples Oars!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: KNOCK HIM DOWN!! SPECIAL ATTACK: STRAW HAT DOCKING?

programme.title: Nami has a horrifying run in with Bartholomew Kuma, Perona becomes the latest lady to vanish, and Chopper, Franky, and Usopp team up to strike a blow against Oars!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE SILENT ASSAULT!! THE MYSTERIOUS VISTOR, "TYRANT" KUMA

programme.title: Kuma has an upsetting message for Moria, Luffy loses track of his intended target, and Zoro attempts to harness the power of a new sword during his battle with Oars!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: OARS + MORIA / THE MOST HEINOUS COMBINATION OF BRAINS AND BRAWN

programme.title: Brook arrives with the salt needed to stop Oars, but the monster shows off some special new abilities. Deep in the forest, Luffy makes some new friends who help him power up!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE SECRET PLAN TO TURN THE TABLES / NIGHTMARE LUFFY MAKES HIS APPEARANCE

programme.title: Brook joins the fight as the Straw Hats valiantly try to hold off Oars and Moria until Luffy returns. Unfortunately, even their combined powers are no match for these evil enemies!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE STRAW HAT CREW GETS WIPED OUT / THE SHADOW-SHADOW'S POWERS IN FULL SWING

programme.title: Oars and Moria ruthlessly pummel the badly beaten Straw Hats. The situation looks bleak until the shocking arrival of Nightmare Luffy!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE INCREDIBLE BATTLE STARTS! LUFFY VS. LUFFY

programme.title: After Luffy's shadow power disappears, he'll need help from rest of the Straw Hats to land a devastating finishing blow in his battle against Oars.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE END OF THE BATTLE IS NIGH! POUND IN THE FINISHING MOVE

programme.title: Moria gobbles up every shadow in sight to power up for a final showdown with Luffy. Can the Straw Hats save the day before the dawn reduces them all to ashes!?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: OUR BODIES VANISH! THE MORNING SUN SHINES ON THE NIGHTMARISH ISLAND!

programme.title: The battle between Luffy and Moria reaches its epic end, and the gargantuan shadow of the towering brute known as Kuma causes a panic on the island!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: NOT OUT OF DANGER YET! ORDERS TO ANNIHILATE THE STRAW HAT CREW

programme.title: Kuma is ordered by the World Government to obliterate every living being on the island, but the Straw Hats battered as they may be refuse to go down without a fight!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: IT REPELS EVERYTHING / KUMA'S PAW-PAW POWER

programme.title: A heated confrontation occurs between Zoro and Sanji as they argue over who will sacrifice themselves to save Luffy, but Kuma's final attack may be worse than death.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Brotherhood of the Wolf, (2001, Foreign Action & Adventure)

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn, (1996, Horror)
programme.desc: In this thrilling cult classic, two dangerous outlaw brothers head out on a wild crime spree. After kidnapping a father and his two kids, the bad guys head to a seedy Mexican bar for safety but come face to face with blood-sucking vampires.

programme.title: Infinite, (2021, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Evan McCauley has skills he never learned and memories of places he has never visited. Self-medicated and on the brink of a mental breakdown, a secret group that call themselves Infinites come to his rescue, revealing that his memories are real.

programme.title: Annihilation, (2018, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A biologist and former solider (Natalie Portman) must lead a mission into a mysterious quarantine zone known as The Shimmer, a beautiful but deadly world of mutated landscapes and creatures that threatens all life on Earth. Also starring Oscar Isaac.

programme.title: Timecop, (1994, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Max Walker, an officer for a security agency that regulates time travel, must fend for his life against a shady politician who's intent on changing the past to control the future.

programme.title: Outlander, (2009, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A man from another world crash lands on Earth during the age of the Vikings.

programme.title: Mad Max, (1980, Action)
programme.desc: Max and the gang's worlds converge when the gang wants Max as badly as he wants them, especially after they target him for the death of their former leader.

programme.title: Annihilation, (2018, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A biologist and former solider (Natalie Portman) must lead a mission into a mysterious quarantine zone known as The Shimmer, a beautiful but deadly world of mutated landscapes and creatures that threatens all life on Earth. Also starring Oscar Isaac.

programme.title: The Way West, (1967, Drama)
programme.desc: Icons Kirk Douglas, Robert Mitchum and Richard Widmark star in this sumptuous, epic tale of the brave men and women in the U.S. who left the comfort and safety of life in the East for the promise of free land a better life in the untamed West.

programme.title: Last Train From Gun Hill, (1959, Drama)
programme.desc: Screen giants Kirk Douglas and Anthony Quinn star in this taut Western thriller directed by acclaimed filmmaker John Sturges (Gunfight at the O.K. Corral, The Great Escape).

programme.title: Pardners, (1956, Comedy)
programme.desc: A rich momma's boy returns west with the son of his murdered father's partner to foil a gang trying to gain control of his family ranch. They accidentally clean up the town.

programme.title: Alias Jesse James, (1959, Drama)
programme.desc: In this hilarious western spoof, insurance broker Milford Farnsworth (Bob Hope) unwittingly sells a life insurance policy worth $100,000 to the infamous Jesse James. Now, he has to figure out how to keep the deadliest outlaw in history alive!

programme.title: Along Came Jones, (1945, Drama)
programme.desc: Gary Cooper gives a marvelous, tongue-in-cheek performance as a fumble-fingered cowpoke who is mistaken for a notorious bandit and almost gets killed by both sides of the law...all while managing to capture the attention of Loretta Young.

programme.title: Indian Territory, (1950, Drama)

programme.title: Mule Train, (1950, Drama)

programme.title: The Blazing Sun, (1950, Drama)

programme.title: Canadian Pacific, (1949, Drama)

programme.title: Adventureland, (2009, Comedy)

programme.title: Abbott and Costello Meet the Killer, Boris Karloff, (1970, Paranormal)
programme.desc: A hotel detective (Bud Abbott) and bellhop (Lou Costello) find dead bodies and a fake swami (Boris Karloff).

programme.title: Abbott and Costello Meet the Mummy, (1970, Paranormal)
programme.desc: Two guys (Bud Abbott, Lou Costello) stuck in Egypt follow a medallion to the crypt of Kharis.

programme.title: The Andromeda Strain, (1970, Paranormal)

programme.title: The Black Cat, (1970, Paranormal)
programme.desc: Stranded Budapest honeymooners follow a mad doctor (Bela Lugosi) to a black-lipped architect's (Boris Karloff) Art Deco manor.

programme.title: The Boy Who Cried Werewolf, (1970, Paranormal)
programme.desc: A boy (Scott Sealey) upset by his parents' divorce must also tell the sheriff his father (Kerwin Mathews) is a werewolf.

programme.title: Bride of Frankenstein, (1970, Paranormal)

programme.title: The Brides of Dracula, (1970, Paranormal)

programme.title: The Car, (1970, Paranormal)
programme.desc: A Western deputy sheriff (James Brolin) chases a driverless black car that keeps running people down.

programme.title: I Got The Hook Up, (1998, Comedy)
programme.desc: Two small time scam artists, Black and Blue, sell boom boxes and broken TVs from their van at the parking lot. When, by mistake, a shipment of cellular phones gets to them, it doesn't take long before FBI and gangsters are after them.

programme.title: The Inspection, (2022, Drama)
programme.desc: Rejected by his mother and with few options, a young, gay Black man joins the Marines, doing whatever it takes to succeed in a system that would cast him aside, unexpectedly finding camaraderie, strength, and support in this new community.

programme.title: Marshall, (2017, Drama)
programme.desc: In 1940, long before he sat on the US Supreme Court, Thurgood Marshall, a young attorney for the NAACP, must overcome prejudice and racism when he takes on the case of a black chauffeur accused of sexually assaulting his white employer.

programme.title: Bopha!, (1993, Drama)
programme.desc: Micah Mangena is sitting on a powder keg and doesn't know it. He's a sergeant in South Africa's police force, a supporter of the powers that be. But the strife tearing at the fabric of 1980 South Africa is about to rip Micah's own world apart.

programme.title: 2020. Na aldeia com Tazuna, Sakura v o sofrimento do povo no Pas das Ondas governado por Gato. Tazuna constri uma ponte que dar acesso a outras terras para as pessoas no dependerem mais de Gato. Naruto e Sasuke treinam, usando chakra para subir em rvore. Gneros: Anime

programme.desc: Naruto: Batalha Na Ponte: Zabuza Retorna - T01E12

programme.title: 2020. Vendo que no h tempo a perder, Kakashi decide usar o Sharingan mais uma vez para derrotar Zabuza. Mas Zabuza um ninja experiente em batalhas mortais e, na primeira vez em que enfrentou o Sharingan, Zabuza conseguiu bolar uma estratgia. Gneros: Anime
programme.desc: Naruto: Visibilidade Zero: O Sharingan Desvendado - T01E15

programme.title: 2020. Naruto e Sasuke so atacados dentro dos Espelhos Cristal de Gelo de Haku. Durante a batalha, Sasuke percebe o poder do seu prprio Sharingan e comea a desviar dos ataques de Haku. Haku decide acabar com ele. Sasuke usa seu corpo para proteger Naruto... Gneros: Anime
programme.desc: Naruto: O Selo Quebrado - T01E16

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Almas Ressuscitadas - T02E66
programme.desc: 2008. Sakura v Sai trabalhando em uma pintura abstrata e encontra um livro de desenhos incomum no meio das coisas dele. Enquanto vo em direo ponte Tenchi, eles se mantm atentos contra qualquer emboscada. Yamato orienta sua equipe caso uma luta acontea. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden - T02E67
programme.desc: 2008. Yamato faz uma simulao para avaliar as habilidades e tcnicas de luta da equipe Kakashi. Sai abandona Naruto para concluir a misso simulada. Naruto fica uma fera e declara que, se para ajudar a salvar o Sasuke, ele ficar na mesma equipe que Sai. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Momento De Despertar - T02E68
programme.desc: 2008. O dia para capturar o espio finalmente chega. Yamato assume a aparncia de Sasori e espera que o espio aparea. Para a surpresa de todos, o espio era Kabuto. De repente, Orochimaru aparece. A situao muda, e a equipe Kakashi se encontra em risco. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Desespero - T02E69
programme.desc: 2008. Ao enfrentar Orochimaru, Naruto liberta o poder da Raposa de Nove Caudas. Quando Yamato v a quarta cauda, lembra do que Jiraiya falou. Yamato deveria suprimir o chakra que afetaria o corpo de Naruto. O ninjutsu secreto de Yamato se torna aparente. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Ressonncia - T02E70
programme.desc: 2008. Quando a terceira cauda aparece, Naruto s consegue ver Orochimaru. Ele est cego at para seus companheiros de equipe. Sakura atingida e cai inconsciente. Sai finalmente segue para sua misso secreta. Naruto libera a quarta cauda proibida. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Meu Amigo - T02E71
programme.desc: 2008. Naruto perde a conscincia e tomado por impulsos destrutivos. Os clones de Sai e Yamato testemunham uma batalha horrvel entre Orochimaru e Naruto. O poder e a aparncia de Naruto se tornam demonacos, como se ele estivesse se transformando na Raposa. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Uma Ameaa Se Aproxima - T02E72
programme.desc: 2008. Naruto, mesmo transformado, no desiste de trazer Sasuke para casa. Sakura ferida por Naruto, mas consegue usar seu ninjutsu para conter a agitao da Raposa de Nove Caudas. Orochimaru tenta deixar o campo de batalha, mas confrontado por Sai. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Invaso Da Akatsuki - T02E73
programme.desc: 2008. Orochimaru aceita levar Sai para o esconderijo. Yamato consegue parar a agitao de Naruto, mas os ferimentos de Naruto so graves. Quando ele volta a si, Yamato revela a ele e Sakura que Sai foi embora e que Danzo pode estar conspirando algo terrvel. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Sob O Cu Estrelado - T02E74
programme.desc: 2008. Naruto e sakura ficam chocados quando descobrem que Danzo planeja trabalhar com Orochimaru. A equipe Dakashi forada a fazer uma pausa. Orochimaru percebe que est sendo seguido pelo clone de Yamato e decide usar Sai para despistar seus perseguidores. programme.desc: An artist (Melvyn Douglas) moves in with a magazine editor (Myrna Loy) whose job depends on the pretense of a husband. Starring Myrna Loy, Melvyn Douglas, Raymond Walburn.

programme.title: Lady of the Tropics
programme.desc: An American playboy (Robert Taylor) falls in love with a Saigon beauty (Hedy Lamarr) who needs a passport. Starring Robert Taylor, Hedy Lamarr, Joseph Schildkraut.

programme.title: Waterloo Bridge
programme.desc: A ballet dancer (Vivien Leigh) and a British officer (Robert Taylor) cross stars on the eve of World War I. Starring Vivien Leigh, Robert Taylor, Lucile Watson.

programme.title: High Wall
programme.desc: A mental-hospital psychiatrist (Audrey Totter) helps a dazed ex-bomber pilot (Robert Taylor) found next to his strangled wife. Starring Robert Taylor, Audrey Totter, Herbert Marshall.

programme.title: Above and Beyond
programme.desc: Air Force Col. Paul Tibbets (Robert Taylor) cannot tell his wife (Eleanor Parker) he is training to drop the atomic bomb on Hiroshima. Starring Robert Taylor, Eleanor Parker, James Whitmore.

programme.title: Valley of the Kings
programme.desc: An archaeologist (Robert Taylor) and a married woman (Eleanor Parker) dig for a pharaohs treasure-filled tomb in 1900 Egypt. Starring Robert Taylor, Eleanor Parker, Kurt Kasznar.

programme.title: Ivanhoe
programme.desc: Back from a Crusade, the knight hero (Robert Taylor) of Sir Walter Scotts novel fights for courtly love and Saxon honor. Starring Robert Taylor, Elizabeth Taylor, Joan Fontaine.

programme.title: Knights of the Round Table

programme.title: A Letter to Three Wives
programme.desc: A flirt tells three women (Jeanne Crain, Linda Darnell, Ann Sothern) she will be leaving town with one of their husbands. Starring Jeanne Crain, Linda Darnell, Ann Sothern.

programme.title: Casablanca

programme.title: Brief Encounter
programme.desc: A married British woman (Celia Johnson) and a doctor (Trevor Howard) meet first at a train station, then fall in love but decide to part. Starring Celia Johnson, Trevor Howard, Stanley Holloway.

programme.title: The Barkleys of Broadway
programme.desc: Half of a husband-and-wife dance team (Fred Astaire, Ginger Rogers) wants to be an actress, so they split up. Starring Fred Astaire, Ginger Rogers, Oscar Levant.

programme.title: The Last Time I Saw Paris
programme.desc: Sudden money ruins a struggling writer (Van Johnson) and his wife (Elizabeth Taylor) in post-World War II Paris. Starring Elizabeth Taylor, Van Johnson, Walter Pidgeon.

programme.title: Alice in Movieland
programme.desc: Alice wins a free trip to Hollywood and dreams about her arrival. Starring Joan Leslie, Nana Bryant, Clara Blandick.

programme.title: Some Came Running

programme.title: Tarzans Magic Fountain

programme.desc: A talented tap dancer uses his craps skills to win ownership of a musical show to make himself the star. Starring Bill Robinson, Ernest Whitman, Dusty Fletcher.

programme.title: Reunion in France

programme.title: When Calls the Heart - Having Faith
programme.desc: When Little Jack falls ill, Elizabeth and Nathan care for him together as Hickam and Mei race to secure medicine; the kids broadcast a baseball game over the radio to lift spirits.

programme.title: Heartland - Riders on the Storm
programme.desc: With the help of Amy and Ty, Scotts nephew comes to the realization that hes worthy of continuing the family tradition of relay racing.

programme.title: Heartland - Eclipse of the Heart
programme.desc: Upon her return from Vancouver, Lou makes an announcement that could forever change the Heartland family.

programme.title: Heartland - Faking It
programme.desc: After Georgie receives devastating news from Lou and Peter, the family attempts to support her.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven - Man to Man
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark help a dying tycoon to reconnect with his only son; they decide it their mission to help the family reconcile their differences before it is too late.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven - Jonathan Smith Goes to Washington
programme.desc: A U.S. senator opposes Jonathan and Marks efforts to pass legislation that could save a little girls life.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven - Oh Lucky Man
programme.desc: Mark and Jonathan become the target of con artists after Mark wins five million dollars.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie - The Family Tree
programme.desc: The Ingalls go to court to adopt Albert, but his father reappears and demands custody.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie - The Third Miracle
programme.desc: Mary must get help when a stagecoach accident traps Adam and endangers a pregnant woman; Laura and Albert offer a beehive to their rivals.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie - Annabelle
programme.desc: Laura becomes jealous when Almanzo dates another girl; Mr. Oleson learns that the fat lady in a visiting circus is his sister.

programme.title: Heartland - All I Need Is You
programme.desc: Lou takes charge of the preparations for the big day; in an attempt to avoid the craziness, Amy tries to domesticate a rescued horse.

programme.title: Heartland - Written in Stone
programme.desc: Lou deals with last minute obstacles in an attempt to give Amy and Ty the perfect wedding.

programme.title: Heartland - Brave New World
programme.desc: A bear lurks near Heartland; Amy and Georgie rescue an injured horse.

programme.title: How to Fall in Love
programme.desc: A socially awkward accountant (Eric Mabius) receives dating tips from his high-school crush (Brooke DOrsay).

programme.title: Second Honeymoon
programme.desc: The children of a couple (Roma Downey, Tim Matheson) on the brink of divorce send their parents on a trip in hopes of rekindling the romance.

programme.title: Remember Sunday
programme.desc: Suffering from short-term memory loss, a man (Zachary Levi) falls in love with the same waitress (Alexis Bledel) every day.

programme.title: Campfire Kiss
programme.desc: A single mother takes her son camping. Soon after she arrives, she starts to butt heads with her cabin neighbor, a single father and outdoors man, who is also in search of a connection with his teen daughter.

programme.title: When Calls the Heart - Must Be Gold
programme.desc: As graduation approaches, Elizabeth and Nathan plan for a happy summer together; Lucas and Edie race Rosemary and Bill to find the gold; the town plans a sweet surprise for Minnie.

programme.title: When Calls the Heart - Lost and Found
programme.desc: Constable Jack Thornton tries to discover a planks rightful owner after it is discovered in the mine; Elizabeth tries to capture the enthusiasm of her students in the wake of tragedy.

programme.title: When Calls the Heart - Cease and Desist
programme.desc: Elizabeth comes up with a plan to keep the widows from moving out of town; they receive an eviction notice from the Coal Company to make way for new miner recruits.

programme.title: When Calls the Heart - A Telling Silence
programme.desc: Elizabeth assists a mute student who is having a difficult time coping with the death of her father; Jack looks into the mysterious circumstances surrounding the burning of Coal Valleys only church.

programme.title: Heartland - All I Need Is You
programme.desc: Lou takes charge of the preparations for the big day; in an attempt to avoid the craziness, Amy tries to domesticate a rescued horse.

programme.title: Heartland - Written in Stone
programme.desc: Lou deals with last minute obstacles in an attempt to give Amy and Ty the perfect wedding.

programme.title: Heartland - Brave New World
programme.desc: A bear lurks near Heartland; Amy and Georgie rescue an injured horse.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven - Basingers New York
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark help a cynical newspaper columnist find the Christmas spirit when he cant come up with a story on Christmas Eve.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven - All That Glitters
programme.desc: A small-time crook finds a briefcase containing $1 million and then needs help fending off the two hoods who lost the money.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven - Wally
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark are assigned to reward the good deeds of a homeless street performer.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie - The Preacher Takes a Wife
programme.desc: Mrs. Oleson demands the Rev. Aldens resignation when she discovers a woman parishioner spent the night in his room.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie - The Halloween Dream
programme.desc: Albert dreams that he and Laura have been captured by Indians who want him to lead an attack against the U.S. Army.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie - The Return of Mr. Edwards
programme.desc: Charles and Laura rush to the aid of an old friend when they learn that a disabling accident has destroyed his will to live.

programme.title: Heartland - Begin Again
programme.desc: Ty prepares to celebrate a milestone; Ty and Amy treat an abandoned horse.

programme.title: Heartland - Riding For a Fall
programme.desc: Georgie gets help performing a trick for the rodeo from Amy, but gets pulled away by Lou and Peter who insist she must focus on her schoolwork.

programme.title: Heartland - Ties of the Earth
programme.desc: Jack struggles with the imminent loss of a friend.

programme.title: Anne Tylers Saint Maybe
programme.desc: Suspicious of his brothers new bride (Mary-Louise Parker), a young man (Thomas McCarthy) meddles in their lives.

programme.title: A Painted House
programme.desc: Members (Scott Glenn, Arija Bareikis, Robert Sean Leonard) of an extended family of cotton farmers deal with hardships in 1950s Arkansas.

programme.title: In From the Night
programme.desc: A writer (Marcia Gay Harden) forms a compassionate bond with her nephew (Taylor Handley) after the troubled teen runs away from his parents.

programme.title: Fairfield Road
programme.desc: A man (Jesse Metcalfe) finds sanctuary in Cape Cod after losing his job and his girlfriend.

programme.title: On the 12th Date of Christmas
programme.desc: Two seemingly incompatible game designers in Chicago team up to create a romantic city-wide scavenger hunt to promote a hotel chain.

programme.title: A Bride for Christmas
programme.desc: Aiden (Andrew Walker) bets his friends that he can convince a woman to marry him by Christmas, and he sets his sights on Jessie (Arielle Kebbel), a young woman who has sworn off serious relationships.

programme.title: Heartland - Begin Again
programme.desc: Ty prepares to celebrate a milestone; Ty and Amy treat an abandoned horse.

programme.title: Heartland - Riding For a Fall
programme.desc: Georgie gets help performing a trick for the rodeo from Amy, but gets pulled away by Lou and Peter who insist she must focus on her schoolwork.

programme.title: Heartland - Ties of the Earth
programme.desc: Jack struggles with the imminent loss of a friend.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven - Song of Songs
programme.desc: After suffering a heart attack, a blind pianist turns to Mark and Jonathan to help him start a new life.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven - Night to Remember

programme.desc: During the D-Day invasion, a group of U.S. soldiers must smuggle a member of the French resistance behind enemy lines to assassinate a high-value Nazi target.

programme.title: The Lookout (2007)
programme.desc: A brain-damaged former athlete (Joseph Gordon-Levitt) finds himself pulled into a heist at the bank where he works as a janitor.

programme.title: Gone Baby Gone (2007)
programme.desc: Two private investigators (Casey Affleck, Michelle Monaghan) tread dangerous ground as they scour the Boston underworld for a kidnapped child.

programme.title: Shaft (2000)
programme.desc: A detective (Samuel L. Jackson) and a narcotics cop (Vanessa L. Williams) track a sociopath out to kill a woman who can testify that he committed murder.

programme.title: No Country for Old Men (2007)
programme.desc: An aging lawman (Tommy Lee Jones) reflects on his past and laments a changing world while trying to find and protect a hunter who took the cash from a drug deal gone bad.

programme.title: The Sum of All Fears (2002)
programme.desc: Jack Ryan (Ben Affleck) and the CIA director (Morgan Freeman) try to stop terrorists who are planning a nuclear attack.

programme.title: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street (2007)
programme.sub-title: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street (2007)
programme.desc: After serving time for a crime he did not commit, a vengeful barber (Johnny Depp) and his accomplice (Helena Bonham Carter) carve up unlucky customers and bake them in meat pies.

programme.title: Shell (2024)
programme.desc: Desperate to reclaim her career, once-beloved actress Samantha Lake gets drawn into the glamorous world of wellness mogul Zoe Shannon, only to uncover a monstrous truth beneath the seemingly flawless surface.

programme.title: Sinister (2012)
programme.desc: A true-crime novelist (Ethan Hawke) and his family become the targets of a supernatural entity when he uses found footage to unravel the murders of his homes previous occupants.

programme.title: Paid in Full (2002)
programme.desc: A dry cleaners delivery boy becomes one of the most powerful drug dealers in 1980s Harlem. Based on a true story.

programme.title: American Selfie: One Nation Shoots Itself
programme.desc: Alexandra Pelosi captures a snapshot of America as the country faces a pandemic, a presidential election and a costly financial collapse.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom (1984)
programme.sub-title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom (1984)

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade (1989)
programme.sub-title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade (1989)
programme.desc: Archaeologist Jones (Harrison Ford) rescues his kidnapped father (Sean Connery), and the two race the Nazis to find the Holy Grail.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull (2008)
programme.sub-title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull (2008)
programme.desc: Indy (Harrison Ford) and a young adventurer (Shia La Beouf) must ferret out a powerful artifact and keep it out of the hands of a deadly Soviet agent (Cate Blanchett).

programme.title: Silence (2016)
programme.desc: Two 17th-century Portuguese missionaries (Andrew Garfield, Adam Driver) face the ultimate test of faith when they travel to Japan to find their missing mentor (Liam Neeson).

programme.title: Black Lotus (2023)
programme.desc: A soldier uses his military training to rescue the kidnapped daughter of his dead friend.

programme.title: The Salvation (2014)
programme.desc: After shooting the man who murdered his wife, a Danish settler (Mads Mikkelsen) incurs the wrath of the mans brother (Jeffrey Dean Morgan), a ruthless land baron who rules their frontier town.

programme.title: The Cut (2024)
programme.desc: Given one last shot at glory, a former boxing champion has just six days to make weight for a title fight. His obsession soon leaves him at the mercy of a notorious trainer who takes every last ounce from his mind, body and soul.

programme.desc: Strange occurrences plague a small-town detective and his family as he investigates the disappearance of a boy.

programme.title: Sleeping Dogs (2024)
